name: Clint Brooks
description: I am a kind heated but strong willed man who loves to treat a woman the way she should be. I don’t like to play the heart games with a woman, when i find the one for me she will be treated with all of the love she wants and needs. I’m not looking for someone I can live with.. I’d much rather find someone I can’t live without!Online dating is all new to me and although I’m not totally clueless, I am excited about the opportunities for meeting interesting people in a new setting away from the usual scenes. I am always looking to meet new people. I enjoy meeting all kinds of people and learning the different things about different people in different situations. I don’t want to tell you how wonderful I am, that, I want you to find out for yourself. I’m looking for a sincere, secure, honest, fun-loving, woman. I enjoy traveling and meeting new people. I also have a strong sense of adventure. I’m looking for someone to be by my side to enjoy all that life has to offer
